CustomField.description: Populates with the list price if the opp isn't closed yet, and populates with the Process Builder-made copy of the list price at closing if it is closed.
CustomField.formula: IF( OR( TEXT(Opportunity.StageName) != "Closing", Opportunity.IsClosed = FALSE ), ListPrice, Copy_of_List_Price_at_Closing__c )
CustomField.label: [DON'T USE] List Price at Closing
